metadata.title: CVE-2020-18974 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow in Netwide Assembler (NASM) v2.15.xx allows attackers to cause a denial of service via 'crc64i' in the component 'nasmlib/crc64'. This issue is different than CVE-2019-7147.

criterions.comment: nasm package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
